member.name: T:System.Text.CodePagesEncodingProvider
member.summary: Provides access to an encoding provider for code pages supported in the desktop .NET Framework but not in UWP apps.

member.name: P:System.Text.CodePagesEncodingProvider.Instance
member.summary: Gets an encoding provider for code pages supported in the desktop .NET Framework but not in the current .NET Framework platform.
member.returns: An encoding provider that allows access to encodings not supported on the current .NET Framework platform.
